descriptionHtml:
[center] This is a simple mod that adds a few throwing stars in the Dark Brotherhood sanctuary by the Sithis book near the table with the map and daggers. I also put one on the nightstand of the first room on the left when you enter the inn of Dawnstar. Once you have got one, read it. Read it? Yes, read it! you will gain the ability to throw ninja stars at your opponents. Laugh as you cut down your opponents and leave them with stars stuck into them. Or do the responsible thing and turn them in to the proper authorities for disposal. Either way, download my mod.
The damage on the stars is decent. You won't be killing people easily with this spell alone, but it does more than just chip away at the health.

Like the gist of this mod? Arrythmia91 did and made his own version! Get it [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53792/?] here. [/url] He has a paralysis version i believe also. Cool stuff :)

[credits]
Bethesda
3DS Max
Nifskope
Gimp
Nexus
Nightasy tutorials
MurdermiesteR (me) [/center]
author: MurdermiesteR
